content: description the strata sunrise throw is a reflection of shifting light and layered color worked with beautiful yarn that fades from cream to deep amber this cozy blanket mimics the beauty of canyon walls at sunrise a rhythmic stitch pattern and soft texture make this the perfect meditative project a full video tutorial is included to walk you through each step find the free pattern on my blog 1 the kit is available with lion brand grab it here 2 and customize your yarn colors a free copy of the printable pdf download is included a full video tutorial is included and linked in the pattern 3 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-strata-sunrise-throw-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //lionbrand sjv io/z6e67r 3 https //youtu be/6zp7ckv49xe
